subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Second-year defensive end Adrian Awasom, who has never started a game in the N.F.L., could replace Michael Strahan on Sunday, who is sidelined two to four weeks with a sprained right foot.
snippet: Second-year defensive end Adrian Awasom, who has never started a game in the N.F.L., could replace Michael Strahan on Sunday, who is sidelined two to four weeks with a sprained right foot.
